title: Eternal Echoes
author: Akira Sato
description: In a world where time is fluid, a young girl discovers a hidden power to relive moments from the past. She must navigate the consequences of altering history.

title: Tech Titans
author: Yuki Tanaka
description: Set in a high-tech megacity, this manga follows a group of brilliant young inventors and hackers as they battle against corporate greed and government surveillance.

title: Whispers of the Wind
author: Emi Nakamura
description: A heartwarming tale of a village where the wind speaks and the trees remember. The manga explores the deep connections between nature and its people.

title: Ninja Rivals
author: Kazuki Yamashiro
description: Two skilled ninja clans, the Higurashi and the Yurei, engage in a generations-old feud. Follow the intense rivalry and secrets that bind them.

title: Starstruck Love
author: Mio Harada
description: A romantic comedy manga set in the world of pop idols. Follow the hilarious and heartwarming adventures of a young fan who accidentally becomes an idol manager.

title: Beyond the Abyss
author: Ryota Suzuki
description: In a post-apocalyptic world, survivors journey into the uncharted abyss, seeking answers and encountering strange creatures. A story of survival and discovery.
